text: (gentle upbeat music)

- The COVID-19 pandemic provens
to be a challenging time

for businesses worldwide
and Alpro Pharmacy
was no exception.

However, amidst the crisis,
we saw an opportunity

to accelerate our long-term
digitalization efforts.

As the largest prescription
pharmacy in Malaysia,

we are committed to providing
a comprehensive range

of healthcare products and
professional healthcare services

to the community across
the country with the goal
of creating a healthy and vibrant world.

At the onset of the pandemic,
we experience an unexpected

400% surge in demand for
our products and services

which resulted in the four full
increase in our operations.

Unfortunately, our basic
inventory and on-premise power
of sales system couldn't keep up
with the rapidly growing demand.
We encounter various challenges such as

inaccurate inventory
reporting, product sell outs

which leads to long wait
times for our patients.
As healthcare front liners, we felt
a stand of duty to ensure
that patients had access to medications

during this significant
healthcare crisis, while also

prioritizing the wellbeing
of our hardworking staff

who were already putting in 18
hour days to fulfill orders.

That's when we turn to
QR Retail Automation Asia
and AWS for assistance.
(gentle soft music)
- The Alpro Pharmacy from QR
Retail Automation is a concrete solution
on AWS that provides retailers

with tools to help them
manage their supply chain,
inventory and the warehouse operations.
The platform leveraged the power of AI
and machine learning to automate processes
and provide real time data insight
for informed decision making.

QR automation, AWS, and
Alpro Pharmacy collaborated
to develop a solution

that would automate Alpro's
warehouse operations,
streamline its supply change

with centralized inventory
system across 200 stores.
With Alpro cloud solution on AWS,

Alpro Pharmacy can now
fulfill orders the same day
with the two hours targets.

They have introduced
our omnichannel system

and warehouse management
system for order fulfillments
and can support increased order volumes
from 500 to 4,000 per day.
- Thanks to this new solution,
we have executed remarkable improvements.

We have achieved an 80%
increase in particular output,

improved the work-life
balance of our staff
and even reduce our operational cost.

The processing and delivery of
prescriptions are now faster

and more accurate,
enabling our pharmacists

to make better decision
about medication management

and provide personalized
care to our patients.

By embracing automation
and online solutions

such as Alpro Cloud on AWS,
we have led a solid foundation
for long-term digitalization efforts
in healthcare that will benefit
both our customers and employees.
(gentle upbeat music)
